replies.msg:
English Translation for our friends from overseas
(Please bear in mind that slight alterations are made for easier understanding and reading and the translator is nowhere near a professional in translation)

Title: For those asking why the number of participants protests and demonstrations in Hong Kong is decreasing greatly recently, I would recommend you to ask the Police

Since 2 in the noon today, there have been riot police presence in every streets from Mong Kok to Tsim Sha Tsui in Kowloon

It is impossible for protestors to gather up when each intersections has as much as a Platoon of Popo that hinders people entering the venue of demonstration by separating groups of people and conducting unnecessary and unreasonable body search. Their act of literally "camping" at the starting point of the Demonstration is creating a burning fuse to escalate the demonstration into a violent clash to frame the protestors of being "a violent mob" and scares people away from participating in protests

This has created a situation which those that are not present in the scene would believe fewer and fewer are taking it to the streets. Taking today's demonstration in Kowloon as an example, the Police led the protestors into a clash at around 1530 by pepper spraying protestors, passersby indiscriminately. As a clash is going on, those who arrived later would turn and extract, not going to the battlefield

As such, it can be said that the decrease in protestors is not caused by us Hong Kongers giving up on this revolution, but the Police conducting a de facto ban on the Freedom of Assembly with their dirty tactics

Title: For those asking why the number of participants protests and demonstrations in Hong Kong is decreasing greatly recently, I would recommend you to ask the Police

Since 2 in the noon today, there have been riot police presence in every streets from Mong Kok to Tsim Sha Tsui in Kowloon

It is impossible for protestors to gather up when each intersections has as much as a Platoon of Popo that hinders people entering the venue of demonstration by separating groups of people and conducting unnecessary and unreasonable body search. Their act of literally "camping" at the starting point of the Demonstration is creating a burning fuse to escalate the demonstration into a violent clash to frame the protestors of being "a violent mob" and scares people away from participating in protests

This has created a situation which those that are not present in the scene would believe fewer and fewer are taking it to the streets. Taking today's demonstration in Kowloon as an example, the Police led the protestors into a clash at around 1530 by pepper spraying protestors, passersby indiscriminately. As a clash is going on, those who arrived later would turn and extract, not going to the battlefield

As such, it can be said that the decrease in protestors is not caused by us Hong Kongers giving up on this revolution, but the Police conducting a de facto ban on the Freedom of Assembly with their dirty tactics

Their tactics:
- Break HK into multiple nodes: street intersections.
- Break flow at each important node
- Break transportation between node.
- Space between node = place to arrest, search, terror, collect fish from net.

Impact:
1. trigger you to get angry, rage, explode into violence..then they have legal reasons to arrest , send videos/photos of evidence to senators
2. create illusion of less people joining ( in fact, jammed at different nodes)

How to solve this issue?

replies.msg:
短中長期
短: 示威, 抗爭, 爆黑幕, 不被捕, 快閃, 各區(不必強求18), 勇武不必次次參加, 因為勇武好珍貴, 消耗太大. 純和理非雖被屌無用, 但亦係重要既民意表達. (其實我都唔明, d人唔出post屌藍人藍店藍popo, 反而會出post屌和理非自己人係咩玩法)

中: 罷買罷食藍店, 示威, 民間人權報告推廣, 抗爭地下化組織化 (不是單一組織, 不需要大台, 反而需要極多單獨自主小台), 尋求長期抗爭既物資同人事援

長: 罷買罷食藍店, 制度內要贏返區選同立會, 政制改革, 教育推動多d人變黃, 制度外尋求更多各界支援, connect更多人, 將抗爭形態化意識化,

quote.msg: 都話出唔到咯屌你

They are playing the game in logistics and networking :

Their tactics:
- Break HK into multiple nodes: street intersections.
- Break flow at each important node
- Break transportation between node.
- Space between node = place to arrest, search, terror, collect fish from net.

Impact:
1. trigger you to get angry, rage, explode into violence..then they have legal reasons to arrest , send videos/photos of evidence to senators
2. create illusion of less people joining ( in fact, jammed at different nodes)

How to solve this issue?

短中長期
短: 示威, 抗爭, 爆黑幕, 不被捕, 快閃, 各區(不必強求18), 勇武不必次次參加, 因為勇武好珍貴, 消耗太大. 純和理非雖被屌無用, 但亦係重要既民意表達. (其實我都唔明, d人唔出post屌藍人藍店藍popo, 反而會出post屌和理非自己人係咩玩法)

中: 罷買罷食藍店, 示威, 民間人權報告推廣, 抗爭地下化組織化 (不是單一組織, 不需要大台, 反而需要極多單獨自主小台), 尋求長期抗爭既物資同人事援

長: 罷買罷食藍店, 制度內要贏返區選同立會, 政制改革, 教育推動多d人變黃, 制度外尋求更多各界支援, connect更多人, 將抗爭形態化意識化,

reply返你岩岩回我個post, 今日仲可以點算？
快閃就可, 無必要等, 若果有set RB, set完就走.
若果有裝修, 裝左就走. 唔好徘徊, 唔好逗留
唔使下下搞到半夜, 約定個時間e.g. 3點到7點, 7點一到全部做街坊回家


以上絕非正確答案, 要集思先可以廣益

Constructive ideas.

"反而會出post屌和理非自己人" : possibilities:
1. One side maybe popo, blueC, etc..
2. if both sides are protestors, the pride may causes them focus primarily on winning or getting credits instead of getting more in-depth understanding of the issues via radical discussion, and solving a problem "together".
3. One side got upset when others gave verbal abuse or bullying, then revenge. Loop starts.
